name: Shooting Wish by Maria Contreras
description:
After a harmless day in space, Pink Star tumbles off the wrong cloud at the wrong time and finds herself at rock-bottom.. Earth. Help Pink Star make her way back home through an unbalanced world and reach the top!

The game consists of various unbalanced platforms that can easily cause Pink Star to fall and reroute her journey. Keep her on track to take her back home quickly and safely. 

Travel through four locations:

  • Earth's surface
  • A cave
  • A snowy mountain
  • And space!

.. and have fun doing it!

Theme:

  • Unbalanced

Credits:

  • NEMORIS GAMES
    Glowy Space - 2D Toon Parallax
    • Used for level 4 and 5.
  • ALIEN NUDE LTD
    Free Asset - 2D Handcrafted Art
    • Used for level 1 and 2.
  • BAYAT GAMES
    Free Platform Game Assets
    • Used throughout all levels.
